name: Tella
description: Tella is an online screen recorder and AI-powered video editor designed to help users create professional videos easily and efficiently.
longDescription: Tella is an online screen recorder available for Mac and Windows, targeted at entrepreneurs, creators, and professionals who want to produce high-quality videos without needing expert editing skills. Its mission is to simplify video production by enabling users to record, edit, and publish content in minutes, addressing the common challenges of time-consuming and complex video creation processes. By integrating AI-powered tools, Tella automates tasks such as removing silences, filler words, and trimming videos, making it accessible for non-experts to achieve polished results. The platform serves users by offering intuitive features that enhance video engagement and quality, ultimately helping businesses grow through effective content like demos, tutorials, and updates. Tella stands out by focusing on ease of use, cross-platform compatibility, and quick sharing options to streamline the entire video workflow.
features: Record videos in small, manageable clips that can be easily edited or rearranged for flexible content creation.
Utilize speaker notes to jot down ideas, talking points, or scripts, helping users stay on topic during recordings.
Access the tool through a native Mac app or browser-based web app for seamless cross-platform compatibility on PC.
Add dynamic transitions with just two clicks to create engaging multi-shot videos that keep viewers interested.
Apply smooth zoom effects to highlight key information and direct viewer attention to important details.
Customize video backgrounds using presets, Unsplash images, or personal uploads to enhance visual appeal.
Leverage AI to delete silences and remove filler words, streamlining the editing process for cleaner videos.
Edit videos using text-based transcripts generated by AI, allowing precise modifications without manual scrubbing.
Automatically trim silent parts at the start and end of videos with AI assistance for professional finishes.
Host videos on Tella for instant sharing via links, enabling viewer comments, downloads, and custom actions.
Export videos in 4K quality for high-resolution use on platforms like YouTube, LinkedIn, or X.
Embed videos on websites or apps for in-line playback, maintaining viewer engagement without leaving the page.

faqs.question: What is Tella?
faqs.answer: Tella is an online screen recorder and AI-powered video editor that allows users to create professional videos quickly and easily. It simplifies the process for non-experts by automating editing tasks and providing intuitive tools.

faqs.question: Does Tella offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tella provides a 7-day free trial with no credit card required, giving access to its core features during that period.

faqs.question: What platforms does Tella support?
faqs.answer: Tella offers a native app for Mac and a browser-based web app for Windows PC, ensuring compatibility across these operating systems.

faqs.question: How does AI work in Tella?
faqs.answer: AI in Tella automates video editing by removing silences, filler words, and enabling text-based edits via transcripts. This helps users polish videos efficiently without advanced skills.

faqs.question: Can I export videos from Tella?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can export videos in 4K quality for use on various platforms or share them directly via customizable links.

faqs.question: What are common use cases for Tella?
faqs.answer: Tella is ideal for creating product demos, tutorials, team updates, product launches, outbound sales content, and teaching materials. It's praised for its speed and ease in these scenarios.

faqs.question: How do I add transitions in Tella?
faqs.answer: You can add dynamic transitions to your videos with just two clicks, making it simple to create engaging multi-shot content.

faqs.question: Does Tella allow custom backgrounds?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tella lets you choose from preset backgrounds, Unsplash images, or upload your own to personalize your videos.

faqs.question: Can I embed Tella videos on my website?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tella supports embedding videos for in-line playback on websites or apps, helping to keep viewers engaged on your platform.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for Tella?
faqs.answer: Tella does not currently mention a mobile app; it is primarily available for Mac and PC via desktop and browser apps.

faqs.question: How does Tella compare to Loom?
faqs.answer: Users often find Tella more intuitive, faster, and feature-rich than Loom, with better AI editing and customization options for professional videos.
